introduction_text: Welcome to My Job Book (the "Site"). We are committed to protecting and respecting your privacy. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information.
information_we_collect_text: We may collect and process the following types of data:
identification_info: Identification Information: name, email address, phone number.
login_info: Login Information: IP address, browser type, time zone, cookie information.
usage_info: Usage Information: information about your use of our website.
use_of_information_text: We use the collected information to:
send_communications: Send you marketing and promotional communications.
respond_requests: Respond to your inquiries and questions.
improve_security: Improve the security of our site.
sharing_information_text: We may share your information with third parties only in the following cases:
process_transactions_services: To process transactions or provide services you have requested.
protect_rights_property: To protect our rights and property.
security_information_text: We implement security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, please note that no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is completely secure.
your_rights_text: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, such as the right to access, rectify, delete, and restrict processing. To exercise these rights, please contact us at [contact email address].
cookies_text: Our site uses cookies to enhance your online experience. A cookie is a small text file that is placed on your device when you visit our site. You can configure your browser to refuse cookies, but this may affect the functionality of the site.
policy_changes_text: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We encourage you to review this page regularly to stay informed about any changes. By continuing to use our site after changes are posted, you agree to those changes.
